title: Grand Opening City to Beachfront: Vietnam’s Newest Boutique Stays
description: From the bustling streets of Ho Chi Minh City to the pristine shores of Ho Tram, this ultimate stress-free Vietnam holiday takes you from the city to the beach in style. Spend two nights amid the lights of Ho Chi Minh City at the brand-new Innside by Meliá Saigon Central, then retreat to the newly opened Meliá Ho Tram Beach Resort, located in a prime beachfront position in Vietnam’s hottest holiday destination - Ho Tram. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast in both hotels, nightly drinks plus your choice of daily lunches or dinners and a 60-minute massage in Ho Tram.
